page.title: 09PARISH CHURCH OF ST MARY
page.content: Long before a church was built, the area was evangelised by monks from Tavistock Abbey. The base of the ancient preaching cross still remains in the churchyard. Robert Le Dun became the first rector in 1266. The spiritual life of the parish revolves around Sunday worship (led by the Rector and choir), and also by prayer meetings and Bible Study/ Fellowship meetings. Outreach:- Parochial Visitors; joint services with local churches; joining in nationwide evangelism initiatives (Mission England - Dr Billy Graham). The church is full for Christmas and Harvest Festival services. But the spiritual backbone of the Church's life and ministry is in the prayerful, born-again Christians who remain committed to the proclamation of the Gospel of Jesus Christ.
